overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging with a total of 3,580 followers. Recent posts have focused on research advancements and opportunities in the field of computational social science and disinformation studies. Engagement metrics indicate a strong connection with his professional audience, particularly on LinkedIn.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research papers, grants, and project updates related to social media analysis and disinformation.
Information on job openings and opportunities for postdoctoral researchers and PhD students in related fields.
Announcements related to upcoming conferences and speaking engagements.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on platforms showing higher engagement like LinkedIn to capitalize on professional interest.
Engage more with followers by responding to comments and reposts to foster community interaction and increase visibility.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate, with technical updates on tools like CooRnet receiving good interaction.
platformInsights.linkedin: Highest engagement levels are observed here, particularly with posts related to research grants and job opportunities.
platformInsights.bluesky: Consistent engagement with posts related to academic papers and conference participation, indicating a growing interest in research content.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
